channel.title: Identifier error in my client.java, somebody please help

item.title: Identifier error in my client.java, somebody please help
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

ok im not good at java and i keep getting this error i dont know what to do, heres the error:

on the complier:
"“client.java:136: expected
public string MBBC;
^
1 error
----------------servername:enabled---------------”

and heres line 136 in client.java and everything around it:
/* --------MOD BOT-----------
// MB = MOD BOT
// -TC = Text Censor
// -BC = Bad Command
// -HT = Help Text
// -ID = Item Duping
*/
public String MBTC;
public String MBBC; <------ line 136
public String MBHT;
public String MBID;

public int teleReq = 0;
public String teleLoc = “”;
public boolean teleOtherScreen = false;

help me please

Read full topic
item.source: Identifier error in my client.java, somebody please help
